2088960.name: Roghill Incident
2088960.description:
Roghill Incident - The story



Imagine finding yourself camping in a remote mountainly area. You're unaware of the dangers which may lurk in the shadows of the valleys surrounding you, when suddenly an intimidating deep rumbling sound can be heard, followed by a bright light hovering over your head, almost blinding you before the strange object disappears into the night sky as fast as it appeared.
You can feel that something extraordinary just happened.
Startled by this encounter you want to start to explore the surrounding area to find help and answers.

...little did you know what really happened on this godforsaken mountain.


Starting from the official release till the first of November 2022, there is a prize game available where you can win merch.

About the game


Roghill Incident is an Indie storytelling/exploration/kind-of-horror game.
Explore an open world at night.
Can you find all locations, notes and hints to uncover the whole story?

More...

The playing time, if you play this game without prior knowledge, is about 90 to 120 minutes.
If the character dies, the game starts over (therefore: always be careful and cautious!).
The use of headphones is highly recommended.
2088960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
